title: Sasami-san at Ganbaranai
alternative_title: ささみさん@がんばらない
description: The story follows a hikikomori named Sasami who is unmotivated about even changing clothes or eating. Her brother takes care of her, even though she despises his slave-like nature. Sasami spends her days viewing the outside world via a “Brother Surveillance Tool” on her computer.
